posts.post_content:
Looking to sell/trade a few n172s. In trade I'd be interested in cuban items or other OJs.

At the moment, I do not have a scanner, but will gladly email you phone pictures and describe the flaws to the best of my ability.

1. Hanrahan (hands on knees pose) VERY nice and clear image. Crease running horizontally through chest. SGC 20 $150 PRICE REDUCED TO $120

2. MC Robinson (hands cupped catching pose) VERY bold image, small area of paper loss. SGC 10 $135 PRICE REDUCED TO $100

3. Lovett (batting pose) VERY VERY NICE CARD AND A NICE IMAGE!!! PRICE $175



Email me at [url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url]
